question: When Vasco Da Gama arrived at Calicut in 1498 who was ruler of that state?
explanation: The Portuguese explorer, Vasco Da gama was the first European explorer to reach India by sea on May 20, 1498 at Kappad near Calicut on the Malabar coast of India and was welcomed by the Hindu ruler of Calicut, Samudiri (Zamorin), who allowed him to take pepper, drugs etc. on board.
